 	/**

+        /**

+    )

+    }
 
 	/**
-	 * Rating value
-	 *
-	 * @var string
-	 * @see get_value()
-	 */

-
-	/**
-	 * Constructor, used to input the data
-	 *

-	 */

-	{

-		$this->value = $value;
-	}
-
-	/**
 	 * String-ified version
 	 *
 	 * @return string
 	 */
-	public function __toString()
+	public function __toString(): string
 	{
 		// There is no $this->data here
 		return md5(serialize($this));
